# Sticky Fingers (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]], [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** S

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 206

*Your fingers exude a slightly viscous secretion and become more nimble. When touched together, your fingertips stick slightly.*

This spell grants you a +10 bonus on [[Sleight of Hand (Skill)|Sleight of Hand]] checks.
